team_a.tactical_setup: Attempted to build from the back and launch counter-attacks.
team_a.performance_summary: Showed moments of attacking promise but struggled to convert chances against a clinical opponent. Defensive vulnerabilities were exploited.

team_b.tactical_setup: Established attacking intent early, pressing high and converting chances effectively.
team_b.performance_summary: Dominated the scoring with clinical finishing and effective counter-attacks. Maintained pressure throughout the game, despite a late red card.

turning_points: Red card affecting Opposition's late game
match_summary.overall_narrative: Opposition dominated the match with clinical finishing and strong attacking intent, securing a 4-1 victory over East London Ballers. East London Ballers showed moments of promise but struggled to convert chances and contain Opposition's attack.
